- Our sales in China have continued to grow steadily over the past quarter. 
- Despite some recent trade tensions, we believe there is still significant opportunity for our products in the Chinese market. 
- Our team on the ground in China has been working hard to expand our distribution network and build stronger relationships with key partners.

- Of course, we will continue to monitor the situation in China closely and adjust our strategy as needed.

- Overall, we feel very good about the direction of our business in China and believe that our investments in the region will pay off in the long-term.

generated.965:
Preceding sentences:

Now I'd like to turn to our progress in the cloud and our key performance indicators. As you know, we're focused on driving growth in our commercial cloud business. This past quarter, our commercial cloud revenue grew 36% year over year to $16.7 billion.

Following sentences:

We're also continuing to invest heavily in our cloud infrastructure to enable our customers to run their businesses more effectively and securely in the cloud. This includes expanding our datacenter footprint, improving our network connectivity, and adding new features and functionality to our cloud services.

Overall, we're pleased with the progress we're making in the cloud, and we believe we're well positioned to continue delivering strong growth and innovation for our customers in the years ahead. Thank you for your continued support.
